title: Work Center Supervisor
summary: Two years of advanced electronics training
Advanced to rank E-5 (Petty Officer 2nd Class) in just four years
Supervised anti-air radar system and personnel for two years
Awarded 3 Navy Achievement Medals and multiple letters of  commendation from the ship's Commanding Officers

title: Electronics Technician
summary: Positions with Axcelis Technologies (semiconductor) and the National Weather Service
Repaired electronic, RF, pneumatic, hydraulic, networking, and robotic systems in semiconductor fabrication and weather sensing equipment

title: Director of Operations
summary: First non-founder employee, started as salesman in shop
Managed production and inventory for a custom menswear company with five shops, and producing factories and vendors across multiple countries
Maintained content visual updates for company e-commerce website built on Shopify platform
Researched and implemented new point of sale system across all store locations with connection to corporate offices, and later it's update to a cloud based platform with browser interface.
